name: RITA Translator
description: RITA Discord Translator Bot.   Providing translation services which many uses for free for all.

DISCORD_TOKEN.description: The login token to your bot!  Find this [here](https://discord.com/developers/applications)  <  Application < Bot < Copy Bot Token

DISCORD_DEBUG_WEBHOOK_ID.description: Enter the ID for Webhook Debug logging, This is not needed but can be helpful for troubleshooting. Refer to https://ritabot.org/troubleshooting/

DISCORD_DEBUG_WEBHOOK_TOKEN.description: Enter the Token for Webhook Debug logging. Refer to https://ritabot.org/troubleshooting/

NODE_MODULES_CACHE.description: This is to ensure that when the bot updates it does not use any old Dependencies that Heroku has stored and gets fresh ones from the package.json file.
